name: Google (search results) - remove "View as HTML"
description:
This style removes the "View as HTML" link for recognized filetypes in Google search results.  I find these to be useless, as there are many other options that easily do a better job.

It's not entirely necessary, but why not?

Enjoy.

(06/23/07 - Updated to include topic specific Google searches: Linux, BSD, & microsoft)
(03/08/08 - Updated to include the inexplicable addition of the "http://www.l.google.com" domain)
(03/08/08 - Updated to include the gz filetype)
css:
@-moz-document url-prefix(http://www.google.com/search?),
               url-prefix(http://www.l.google.com/search?),
               url-prefix(http://www.google.com/linux?),
               url-prefix(http://www.google.com/bsd?),
               url-prefix(http://www.google.com/microsoft?) {

.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".pdf+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".PDF+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".ps+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".PS+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".wk1+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".WK1+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".wk2+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".WK2+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".wk3+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".WK3+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".wk4+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".WK4+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".wk5+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".wki+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".WKI+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".wks+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".WKS+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".wku+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".WKU+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".lwp+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".LWP+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".mw+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".MW+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".ppt+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".PPT+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".pps+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".PPT+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".doc+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".DOC+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".xls+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".XLS+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".wks+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".WKS+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".wps+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".WPS+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".wdb+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".WDB+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".wri+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".WRI+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".rtf+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".RTF+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".odp+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".ODP+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".odt+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".ODT+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".ods+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".ODS+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".odf+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".ODF+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".odg+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".ODG+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".gz+"],
.g > .w + .r + table > tbody > tr > .j > [size="-1"] > .f + [href*=".GZ+"]

{display:none !important;}

}
